description: Couchbase Vector Store with search capabilities for similarity search and document storage

connection_string.info: Connection string to connect to the Couchbase cluster (e.g., couchbase://localhost)

bucket_name.info: Name of the Couchbase bucket to store vectors

scope_name.info: Name of the scope within the bucket

collection_name.info: Name of the collection within the scope

index_name.info: Name of the search index to use for vector search

embedding.info: Embedding model to use for vectorizing documents

number_of_results.info: Number of results to return from similarity search

status.build_successful: Vector store built successfully - Bucket: {bucket}, Collection: {collection}, Index: {index}

warnings.empty_query: No search query provided or query is empty

errors.import_failed: Failed to import Couchbase dependencies. Install it using `uv pip install langflow[couchbase] --pre`
errors.build_failed: Failed to build Couchbase vector store: {error}
errors.search_failed: Failed to search documents in Couchbase: {error}

logs.waiting_for_ready: Waiting for cluster to be ready...
logs.creating_from_documents: Creating vector store from {count} documents - Bucket: {bucket}, Collection: {collection}
logs.store_created_with_documents: Vector store created successfully with {count} documents
logs.creating_empty_store: Creating empty vector store - Bucket: {bucket}, Collection: {collection}
logs.searching: Searching for similar documents - Query: '{query}...', K: {k}
